name: Escape The Nightmare (Strumbi)
description:
This version of the game is made just for testing to find as many bugs as possible in the first and second LVL and so you can tell me do you like the ideas of first and second LVL. Third LVL is not made for playing it is just there so I can see if you can enter it. Full version will have save data so you don’t have to complete it one go.

This game has a story but there is a big chance that you will not understand it by just playing 2 LVLs(when you play 3rd or 4th LVL story should be clear)

Controls:

WASD - moevement

E - activate or pick up stuff

left click - flashlight

for story activate radio on every LVL
